Self_Destruct.display_help: The Warworks are rigged to explode when they are incapacitated, this will deal moderate lethal and fire damage to all nearby.
Self_Destruct.display_short_help: Post Death, PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Fire/Lethal), Foe Knockback

Meltdown.display_help: The Warworks are rigged to explode, this particular unit was equipped to melt down and leave behind a plasma patch.
